EmailTemplate.description: General Template used to communicate urgent down time to users.
EmailTemplate.name: _Down Time Notice (Internal)
EmailTemplate.subject: [Salesforce] URGENT DOWN TIME COMPLETED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
An emergency down time of ca. 30 minutes for Salesforce has been completed. Service for our server has been restored.
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Charles Derby
